mapper.select: SELECT bidx, btitle, bcontent, bdate, bcnt, m.mid FROM board_tb b, member_tb m
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_tb (btitle, bwriter, bcontent, bdate, bcnt) VALUES (#{btitle}, #{bwriter}, #{bcontent}, now(), 0)

choose.when: WHERE b.bwriter = m.mid AND (m.mid like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") OR bcontent like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%") OR btitle like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%"))
choose.otherwise: WHERE b.bwriter = m.mid AND ${searchOption} like CONCAT("%",#{keyword},"%")
